website_summaries.verdict: Regrows hair and improves hair volume and density.
pros: Spray formula covers more space and can be used on dry or wet hair
Unique  Regeniplex botanical blend  stimulates scalp and creates the perfect situation for hair regrowth
85% of customers saw more volume and strength in eight weeks
cons: Needs to be applied twice a day

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for over a month and I do like it. I think it works HOWEVER after two ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a month and I do like it. I think it works HOWEVER after two sprays the sprayer stopped working. I had to transfer it into a new bottle for it to spray. Disappointing that an expensive product such as this breaks after two sprays. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my hair stylist
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my hair stylist. I have only been using it for a couple of months. My hair is not falling out the way it was. The only negative is the pump. I was warned by my stylist there were complaints about the pump not working. The first bottle the pump worked for one application, the second about two weeks, and the recent bottle only worked for less then a week. I had to purchase a traveling squeeze bottle such as you would use with hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: hard to tell if it works bc it preserves hair ...
customer_reviews.text: hard to tell if it works bc it preserves hair, it doesn't encourage new growth, but i think i notice less hair in my brush and on my bathroom floor, so that's a sign that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with the idea that it would help my thinning hair and possibly assist with new growth. I have not noticed any positive difference. In fact, I feel like my hair is actually looking a bit THINNER! This is a very expensive hair product and I am very disappointed. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shake shake shake!
customer_reviews.text: I notice that reviewers complain about the pump failing to work. You MUST shake the bottle before and even during use to keep the pump from clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I can’t claim dramatic results in the short time I’ve used this, BUT there is less hair in my brush and in the tub strainer. It’s clean smelling, easy to apply and leaves no residue. Others have complained about the nozzle clogging, but I pull it off and run under hot water at every use and store with the nozzle protector it shipped with, and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Biotin!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister for her birthday. Have been using it on my own hair, and: IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: akindofmagick

customer_reviews.title: this really works for me
customer_reviews.text: This along with the shampoo and conditioner has halted my hair from thinning. I feel it is worth the price. It last for a while. It is a bit warm when I first put it on but not uncomfortable. My scalp is fairly tough but I do have mild case of psoriasis which is what i attribute to the warm feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair (female, mid-40’s) and I use the shampoo and conditioner that go with this serum. I think the shampoo and conditioner are working. I have used the serum now for about a month and haven’t noticed thicker hair beyond what the shampoo/conditioner do. The serum is thin and it just sort of runs down my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyme or Reason

customer_reviews.title: feels amazing, does not make your hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: Works SOOO well, feels amazing, does not make your hair greasy, and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Don’t notice a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and I’ve been using it for a while and don’t really notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: its hard to tell whether these things work or not but I like to use it as a sort of styling gel
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers are right when they say that the bottle clogs up and stops working. As for the product, its hard to tell whether these things work or not but I like to use it as a sort of styling gel. It gives the hair volume and mildly keeps it in place. Not sure if its actually stopping any thinning though.
customer_reviews.author: CalebD

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that does what it promises!!
customer_reviews.text: It was posted that it would have the best results after a 3-month use, but I started seeing results within the first month. The loss of hair dropped to half and it has continued to reduce my hair loss after washing and brushing. I continue using it everyday. Have recommended to my sister and she has had similar results. Great product. Wish the tonic came in a larger more economical size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 months but works
customer_reviews.text: I want to take a minute to say I was skeptical. My sister bought me this for Christmas. I googled what to expect and it was true. Took 3 months but new hair is coming in. I have severe scalp psoriasis. It hasn’t helped that much, my scalp doesn’t itch as often. I’ll keep you posted in my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.Put a nozzle from old bottle on.But this batch is making scalp itch.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Put a nozzle from old bottle on. But this batch is making scalp itch. Something not right. Not same ingredients as before. Not sure if bad batch or a fake. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It smells so good! Not sure if it really works but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Losing more hair not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used it, I thought it was going to work, end up losing more hair.
customer_reviews.author: GARY  Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and my hair dresser even noticed a difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of this product
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this product! Haven't used it long enough to say if it works or not. Will update!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Defected delivery
customer_reviews.text: Defected leaking bottle was delivered, This should not have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended it. It's okay, but does not grow new hair like Rogaine is supposed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: To inform you
customer_reviews.text: My item was brought to my door this afternoon. Want to let you know no action on your part is needed at this time.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Day

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair is getting thicker the more I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Huyter II

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price...really saw results right away. So relieved to find something that works.
customer_reviews.author: GA Family

customer_reviews.title: Application Bottle doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer doesn't work. Bought sample bottle locally and sprayer stopped working after a couple of pumps. Tried this larger size and the same thing happened. Heard other people saying the same thing. Maybe in near future Paul Mitchell Co will design a different application bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Product FAILURE
customer_reviews.text: I used this about 10-12 times and the pumping mechanism stopped working. I cleaned it and took it apart. It still does not work. I now have an expensive product that is a pain in the ass to use. I'm NOT happy with this product will be looking for your assistance for a new one to be shipped or a refund. Mat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May (? ) help with thinning, but doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: May (?) help with thinning, but doesn't regrow hair. Also, the pump has clogged and become unusable on every bottle I have used. For that amount of money, the product should work, and the pump should have been reworked before they started selling the product. Another scam product sold through advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both bottles did not work
customer_reviews.text: Both bottles did not work (the pump and spray part). Had to purchase and empty bottle and pour contents into so I could get use from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Team Thomas

customer_reviews.title: this is my second bottle I don't see any Improvement ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my second bottle I don't see any Improvement my hair is still thin and is still breaking thanks but no thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure whether this product is working for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure whether this product is working for my hair, the jury is still out on that one. Also why are the bottles of this tonic so small ...
customer_reviews.author: Aveann Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Idk about the product itself yet, but the package ...
customer_reviews.text: Idk about the product itself yet, but the package shouldn’t arrive wet and leaking for how much money is spent. If I wasn’t in desperate need of the product I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can't get past the smell. Sorry I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nohava

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is the same product you can buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is the same product you can buy in salons. one thing to be aware of, the pump mechanism has failed.
customer_reviews.author: bstrong

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clogged after one use, tried a different nozzle and that clogged too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Giacomelli

customer_reviews.title: Pump quit workin
customer_reviews.text: The pump quit working and I tried to put the liquid in another spray bottle and it still doesn't work. 40$ down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely works - better than Rogaine. I've been using for 2 years now, and as long as I keep using it at least once per day with few skips, I don't lose hair. After 9 months or so I noticed a significant increase in the volume of my hair. I never would have given a product like this a second look, but a stylist recommended it and she's one I totally trust. You have to be patient, but if you experience hair loss from hormones, or if you get the dread shed certain times of year, this may help you!!
customer_reviews.author: AImeeS

customer_reviews.title: ... along with the Paul Mitchell Scalp Care Shampoo and love them both
customer_reviews.text: I use the Pau Mitchell Tea Tree Scalp AnitThinninng along with the Paul Mitchell Scalp Care Shampoo and love them both. My hair hasn't been coming out like it was before and I have noticed some hair growth back in certain areas that was losing hair the most.
customer_reviews.author: earlene lucas

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Scalp
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, works as advertised and has a pleasant, slightly tea tree oil scent. Sprayer can get clogged so I recommend rinsing the nozzle after each use, appears to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amfyr

customer_reviews.title: Strong Fragrance (People with Sensitivities)
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, my bottle had leaked during shipping. This ended up being a blessing in disguise because I had a chance to smell the product. I'm sensitive to fragrances, and this one has a strong (to me) chemical scent. Unfortunately, I have to put it on the "do not recommend" list for others with this sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Thought I could tell a difference the first few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I could tell a difference the first few weeks, but it may have been because i just had my hair cut. now, i still have a lot of hair falling out so we'll give it some more time...
customer_reviews.author: Lisabelle

customer_reviews.title: Just starting treatment  so can't judge yet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying this on information from friends that have used it and were happy with the results. As I've only used it a short time I really can't say how well it does or doesn't work. I only gave 2 stars because when it arrived the bottle had leaked all over the bubble rap. While I should have returned it due to terrible packaging I wanted to start the procedure with the shampoo and conditioner. There is no excuse for the packaging issue. I read several reviews that had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: WINNIFRED O'BRIEN

customer_reviews.title: BOGUS
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle failed after a few uses. I called Paul Mitchell for a replacement nozzle & they told me the product was BOGUS because I didn't get it from a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Terri D. McElhaney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle I have bought and the spray simply does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy, sprayer clogged
customer_reviews.text: Not real happy, sprayer clogged. Washed it again and again, it just clogged again and again. Given price you would think they could provide a better spray bottle
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Have been using PM products for decades, this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using PM products for decades, this one for only a month. Cannot give long term review, hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Scalp Care Anti-Thinning Tonic
product_meta.description:
Size:3.4 Fl Oz

85% REPORTED INCREASED HAIR VOLUME AND STRENGTH*

Create an optimal scalp environment for thicker, stronger, fuller hair. This leave-on scalp treatment helps stimulate the scalp with the exclusive Regeniplex blend of Kakadu plum, pea peptides, clover flower, turmeric and ginseng, resulting in fuller, thicker-looking hair. Spray onto the scalp twice daily to dissolve oily buildup, stimulate the scalp and help encourage healthy hair growth.

Hair Type: Ideal for Thinning Hair.

Fragrance: Inspired by nature and the botanical ingredients found in the Tea Tree Scalp Care products—bright lemon, basil and fir top notes mixed with florals, fresh herbs and rich base notes of patchouli, vanilla and amber. Tea Tree Scalp Care's uplifting scent is an olfactive garden for the senses.

*When used as part of the Scalp Care Anti-Thinning product regimen. Based on an 8-week clinical study on 28 people conducted in an independent laboratory. Results may vary.



BRAND STORY
Tea Tree is botanical hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products that is committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
